name: Breakfast Felt Set with Dishes
description:
This breakfast set comes with an egg, two pancakes, maple syrup, and a tab of butter. 
They are all made of eco-fi felt, except the butter is made from wool-blend felt.
The pancakes and egg are stuffed with eco-friendly batting, which is a ingeo/cotton blend. The ingeo fibers are derived from the renewable resource corn.
The tab of butter is stuffed with bamboo batting.
All were hand-sewn and/or machine sewn. 

This breakfast set comes with a plastic plate, spoon, and fork, which are made by GreenToys from recycled milk jugs.

Each pancake measures 3.5" across and 0.75" tall. 
The egg measures 3" across.
The maple syrup blob measures 2.5" across.
The square-shaped butter measures 0.625" on each side and 0.25" tall

** This breakfast set can be a choking hazard.**
All children under 3 years need to be supervised.

name: Houndstooth Bear, Upcycled
description:
The bear is made from upcycled woolen garments. The nose and eyes are made of wool felt and eco-fi felt.

This bear is stuffed with with 100% PLA fiber, which is made from the renewable resource corn. Eco-friendly, ingeo fibers are super soft and hypoallergenic.

The bear measures 9" tall and 9.75" from paw to paw.

name: Under the Sea Octopus
description:
This cute octopus is a cuddly, soft toy and can be used as a pillow.
It would make a perfect toy for a baby .

The octopus' body made from eco bamboo/organic cotton fleece and tentacles are made from bamboo/ organic cotton jersey fabric. 
Its face is made from eco-fi felt and is handsewn.

The entire octopus is sewn with Madeira's eco- friendly thread and embroidery floss, which is safe for kids and babies.

The octopus is stuffed with natural Kapok fiber, derived from seed pods of the Ceiba tree. The octopus' tentacles have some organic buckwheat hulls for a natural crinckle sound.


The octopus measures 12" across, from tentacle to tentacle.

name: Toadstool Mushroom Rattle
description:
This mushroom rattle is made from eco bamboo frech terry and bamboo/ rayon blend felt for the top.
Stuffed with natural Kapok fiber, derived from seed pods of the Ceiba tree. Kapok fibers are super soft and hypoallergenic.
This rattle has a metal bell enclosed inside 2 plastic caps for the rattling noise .
It's sewn with Madeira's eco- friendly thread, which is safe for kids and babies.

The rattle measures 6" from top to bottom.
The mushroom top measures 4" in diameter.

name: Felt Sandwich Set
description:
The sandwich set is made of eco-fi felt.
The bread and tomato is stuffed with with 100% PLA fiber, which is made from the renewable resource corn. Eco-friendly, ingeo fibers are super soft and hypoallergenic.
All of the items were hand-sewn with embroidery floss.

This sandwich set includes:
2 slices of bread- 4 in.high, 2.75 in. wide,and 0.5 in. tall
1 slice of cheese- 2.5 inches high and wide
1 slice of bologna- 2.75 inches in diameter
1 slice of tomato- 2 inches in diameter and 0.5 in. tall
1 lettuce leaf- 4 inches high and 3.5 inches wide

**This sandwich set can possibly be a choking hazard.**
All children under 3 years need to be supervised.
